name: Return to Gaurdia
description:
Whether you’re here for the nostalgia or the excitement of a new game, this is the place for you!

As a Massive Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG), RTG gives you the excitement of leveling a wide variety of skills, fighting it out with many different types of enemies, completing quests, and of course the always favorite player-versus-player combat. Whether you Master Fishing, or Master Swordmanship there is something for everyone.  Take your place among the factions and/or nations and make your mark in the whimsical world of RTG.

Come join us today Return To Guardia.  Be the next to strike fear in the hearts of enemies as you make your way to the top!

https://discord.gg/Jj5T4wM - Discord
